name: urllib
description: Help in opening URLs (mostly HTTP) in a complex world â€” basic and digest authentication, redirections, timeout and more. Base undici API.
author: fengmk2 <fengmk2@gmail.com> (https://github.com/fengmk2)

scripts.build: vite run build:ts && vite run build:version
scripts.build:cjs:test: cd test/cjs && rm -rf node_modules && npm link ../.. && node index.js
scripts.build:esm:test: cd test/esm && rm -rf node_modules && npm link ../.. && node index.js
scripts.build:mts:test: cd test/mts && rm -rf node_modules && npm link ../.. && tsc
scripts.build:test: vite run build && vite run build:cjs:test && vite run build:esm:test && vite run build:mts:test && vite run test-tsc
scripts.test-tsc: vite run test-tsc:cjs:es2021 && vite run test-tsc:cjs && vite run test-tsc:esm
scripts.test-tsc:cjs: cd test/fixtures/ts && rm -rf node_modules && npm link ../../.. && vite run build
scripts.test-tsc:cjs:es2021: cd test/fixtures/ts-cjs-es2021 && rm -rf node_modules && npm link ../../.. && vite run build
scripts.test-tsc:esm: cd test/fixtures/ts-esm && rm -rf node_modules && npm link ../../.. && vite run build
scripts.test: vite run lint -- --fix && vite test run --reporter=dot
scripts.test-keepalive: cross-env TEST_KEEPALIVE_COUNT=50 vite test run --reporter=dot --test-timeout 180000 keep-alive-header.test.ts
scripts.test-node16: node examples/httpclient.cjs && node examples/search_github.cjs && node examples/timing.cjs
scripts.ci: vite run cov && vite run prepublishOnly && npm pack && attw --pack
